newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt pound gains slightly against the dollar.
newsitem.headline: Egypt pound gains slightly against the dollar.

text.p: The Egyptian pound edged up against the dollar on Tuesday in a slightly liquid private sector market, bankers said.
"The market is relatively more liquid than yesterday (Monday)," one banker said.
Four actively trading banks quoted the dollar between 3.3890 and 3.3930 pounds bid and 3.3910 and 3.3950 pounds offered in the interbank market.
The average rate was 3.3915 pounds bid and 3.393375 pounds offered, compared to 3.3926 pounds bid and 3.3948 pounds offered on Monday.
The central bank calculated the average exchange rate at midday as 3.389267 pounds buy and 3.393840 pounds sell.
